DOC.brief_summary: Researchers Memorial Sloan-Kettering Cancer Center , collaboration The New York Presbyterian Hospital-Weill Medical College Cornell University , conduct study medicinal mushroom extract call Maitake ( pronounced my-tock-e ) . Laboratory study show Maitake reduce growth cancer animal . The Maitake kill cancer cell directly . It believe work immune system ( body 's defense system infection ) . Our test tube , animal human dose determine study show Maitake enhance immune function . We conduct study see whether Maitake improve neutrophil count function patient MDS . The neutrophils white blood cell help fight infection .
DOC.brief_title: Does Maitake Mushroom Extract Enhance Hematopoiesis Myelodysplastic Patients ?
DOC.criteria: MSKCC patient age 18 old able sign inform consent Absolute Neutrophil count > 0.5 K/mcL Diagnosis MDS bone marrow biopsy Patient candidate aggressive standard treatment IPSS ( High risk ) History AML History Stem Cell transplant Known history HIV+ Allergy mushroom Bone Marrow blast > 10 % HEALTHY CONTROL ELIGIBILTY CRITERIA Inclusion Criteria Age â‰¥55 year Exclusion Criteria Currently take corticosteroid immunosuppressant Known history HIV+ Current previous malignancy hematology disorder except adequately treat nonmelanoma skin cancer , curatively treated insitu cancer cervix , solid tumor curatively treat evidence disease > 3 year
